summary: Allows you to craft weapons and armor that are otherwise uncraftable after doing the quests associated with the items.
descriptionHtml:
Craftable Vanilla Weapons & Armor

CVW&A is a mod I have been searching for but could not find. I decided to 

make it after getting frustrated with having all these cool looking weapons 

and armors but no way to craft them and therefore enchant them with what I 

want to enchant them with. At first it was going to be just the Nightingale 

gear but after looking at all the weapons and armor that should be 

craftable but are not I decided to make this addon and distribute it on 

Nexus.

What this mod does is allows you to craft almost all the noncraftable 

weapons and armors in Vanilla Skyrim as long as you do the required 

prerequisites mostly a quest tied to the item in question.

There is no notice to say you learned the recipe that is something I 

could not figure out but I will work on adding that part in a future 

update... Maybe (It will depend on how well received this mod is.)

This should not be unbalanced at all. I tried to keep everything balanced. 

Although I did up the damage or crit or armor rating on some items. If you 

feel something is unbalanced let me know and I will go back and change it. 


Any bugs or adverse reactions to anything to do with this mod just let me know and I will try to fix and update it A.S.A.P.


OK so what was it I did you ask?

For Armor here is what i did.

Nightingale Armor and Weapon Set 
Craftable after you take the oath and become a guardian of the Twilight 

Sepulcher during the quest \"Trinity Restored\". Requires Daedric 
Blacksmithing and Advanced Blacksmithing and Arcane Blacksmithing.

Redgaurd clothes 
Are now changed to armor and is craftable after you complete \"In My Time Of 
Need\" and help Saadia or your race is Redguard.

Greybeard Gear 
Is now armor and craftable after you return the horn during the quest \"The 
Horn of Jurgen Windcaller\". Requires Advanced Armorsmithing.
This might not work please let me know so I can fix it.

Masque of Clavicus Vile 
Craftable after you complete \"A Daedra\'s Best Friend\" and choose to not 
kill Barbas. Requires Advanced Armorsmithing and Daedric Armorsmithing.

Ancient Shrouded Armor 
Craftable after completing the quest \"Locate the Assassin of Old\". Requires 
Advanced Black Smithing and Arcane Blacksmithing.

Cicero\'s Gear 
Is now armor and craftable after you complete \"The Cure for Madness\" and 
let Cicero live and acquire Dawnstar Sanctuary. Meeting him outside will 
give you the recipe to craft his armor. Requires Advance Smithing

Excecutioner gear 
Craftable after you complete \"Kill the Bandit Leader\" for Ahtar. Requires 
Advance Smithing. I also gave the Axe some crit and upped the damage a few 
both for the vanilla and my version.
This might not work please let me know so I can fix it.

Savior\'s Hide 
Craftable after you comeplete \"Ill Met By Moonlight\". Doesn\'t matter wether 
or not you let Sinding live or kill him since it\'s possible to get both 
ring and hide.

Ebony Mail 
Made into light armor and is craftable After you complete \"Boethiah\'s 
Calling\" Requires Daedric Smithing.

Spike Shield (Targe Of The Blooded)
Nothing special needed to craft this shield just Steel Smithing.

Torturer\'s Hood (The hood the torturer is wearing at the beginning of the 
game.)
Nothing special needed here just the mats.



Here is what I did for weapons.

Akaviri Katana
Craftable and nothing special needed here just Steel Smithing.

Ghost Axe, Bow and Sword 
Craftable after you complete \"The Staff of Magnus\" Requires Arcane 
Blacksmithing and Advanced Blacksmithing.

Blade of Woe 
Craftable after completing \"Destroy the Dark Brotherhood!\" or \"With Friends 
Like These...\" 

Dawnbreaker 
Craftable after finishing \"The Break of Dawn\" Requires \"The Break of Dawn\" 
Requires Daedric smithing and Arcane Smithing.

Blade of Sacrifice 
Craftable after finishing \"Boethiah\'s Calling\" 
Requires Daedric Blacksmithing.

Blade of Woe
Craftable after you complete \"Death Incarnate\" or kill Astrid to start the 
quest \"Destroy the Dark Brotherhood!\"
Requires Steel Smithing.

Blade Of Ysgramor
Craftable after you become the Harbinger of The Companions.
Requires Steel Smithing and Advanced Smithing.

Dragon Priest Dagger
Requires Ebony Smithing.

Ebony Blade
Craftable after you complete \"The Whispering Door\"
Requires Ebony Smithing.

Giant Club
Craftable after you complete \"The Cursed Tribe\"
Requires Steel Smithing.

Keening
Craftable after you complete \"Arniel\'s Endeavor\".
Requires Dwemer Smithing and Arcane Smithing

Mehrunes Razor
Craftable after you complete \"Pieces of the Past\". And choose to kill 
Silus.
Requires Daedric Smithing and Arcane Smithing

Sanguine Rose
Craftable after completing \"A Night To Remember\"
Requires Arcane Smithing and Daedric Smithing.

Skull of Corruption
Craftable after completing \"Waking Nightmare\" It does not matter whether or 
not you decide to kill Erandur.
Requires Daedric Smithing and Advanced smithing.

Volendrung
Craftable after completing \"The Cursed Tribe\"
Requires Arcane Smithing, Daedric Smithing

If anything is unbalanced wrong or just plain dumb let me know This is my 

first mod EVER and I know it will have issues so please let me know.

Thanks to the people at Nexus and Bethesda forums that replied to my posts and pointed me in the right direction

Future Plans:
A notice saying \"You have learned a new Smithing recipe\"
Balance tweaks (Changing some of the armor ratings as feedback is given.)
?
?
author: lolbored
